to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: In the second part, the litigation value and theory basis of discretional non-prosecution was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分阐述了酌定不起诉制度的基础和价值。

sentences.english: This applies to the discretion of sentencing judges to avoid arbitrariness in the plot.
sentences.chinese: 这样可以避免审判人员适用酌定量刑情节随意性。

sentences.english: And at the discretion of the sentencing of the circumstances in the future development of a number of ideas.
sentences.chinese: 并且对酌定量刑情节未来的发展提出了若干构想。

sentences.english: The third part of the paper studies the same problems in the discretionary circumstances of sentencing.
sentences.chinese: 文章的第三部分是对酌定量刑情节适用问题的探讨。

sentences.english: Also, the writer introduces the function of discretionary circumstances of sentencing.

sentences.english: The third chapter mainly discusses purposes of the legislation of the discretionary circumstances of sentencing.
